I'd been at the lowest point in my 25 years of existence. Just when I thought I could end it all, I found this work of art. This game has easily become one of my favorite titles amongst games such as Huniepop, 3D Hentai Girl Simulator, and Fallguys. It's through this game that I've developed critical life skills such as communication, time management, an openness to feedback, and how to plant a bomb in densely populated areas. Valorant is by far the best game I've ever played and is a 10/10 in my book.
